summary: When Confederate officer Colt Saunders returns to his Texas ranch after the war he finds his lands wanted by carpetbaggers and by corrupt provisional government commissioners Harrison and Cable.
cast: Charlton Heston|Anne Baxter|Gilbert Roland|Tom Tryon|Forrest Tucker|Bruce Bennett|Elaine Stritch|Barton MacLane|Peter Hansen|John Harmon|Ross Bagdasarian|Robert Blake|Jamie Farr|Leo Castillo|Don Devlin|Raymond Greenleaf|Roy Engel|Argentina Brunetti|Carl Andre|Robert Arthur|Walter Bacon|Bill Baldwin|John Benson|Chet Brandenburg|Frank Cady|Taggart Casey|Don Dunning|Duke Fishman|James Gavin|Paula Hill|Helen Jay|Paul Levitt|Kenneth MacDonald|John McKee|Jody O'Connor|Ernestine Wade
title: La ley de los fuertes
